v.v: God, do not continue to be silent!
because your enemies are rioting against you;
They are secretly planning to do things to harm us, your people;
They say, “Come, we must destroy their nation
They have agreed on what they want to do to destroy Israel,
Your enemies are the people who live in the tents of Edom—
the people of Gebal, and the Ammonites, and the Amalekites,
The people of Assyria have joined them;
God, do to those people things as you did to the Midian people group,
You destroyed them at the town of Endor,
Do to them things like you did to kings Oreb and Zeeb;
who said, “We will take for ourselves the land that the Israelites say belongs to God!”
My God, cause them to disappear quickly like whirling dust,
As a fire completely burns a forest
Cause them to be very ashamed
Cause them to be forever disgraced because of being defeated,
Cause them to know that you, whose name is Yahweh,

v: Do not be quiet and say nothing
those who hate you are rebelling against you!
they are conspiring together against the people whom you protect.
so that no one will remember that Israel ever existed!”
and they have agreed to attack you together.
the Ishmaelites, Moab and the Hagrites, they conspire together with
and the Philistines, and the people of the city of Tyre.
they are strong allies of the Moab and Ammon people groups, who are descendants of Abraham’s nephew Lot.
as you did to Sisera and Jabin at the river Kishon.
and their corpses lay on the ground and decayed.
defeat their leaders like you defeated Zebah and Zalmunna,
like chaff that the wind blows away!
and as flames burn in the mountains,
and cause them to be terrified by your big storms!
so that they will admit that you are very powerful.
and cause them to die while they are still disgraced.
are the supreme ruler over everything on the earth.
